title: You better do somthing with this riot...
body:
"No love is impossible, my god demands you do what your heart desires" -  {{champion:420}}  to {{champion:55}} 

{{champion:55}}  X{{champion:86}}  Confirmed. make it happen riot!

replies.body:
http://orig08.deviantart.net/5c17/f/2014/299/5/f/now_kiss_by_shinaa-d847h9f.gif

{{champion:420}}: http://36.media.tumblr.com/tumblr_mat8j6siti1r8xzdwo2_500.jpg
Actually expanding it would be nice.  Kinda tired of just getting hints.
Illoai is a hypocrite.  She turned down Gangplank's cannon for her god, but tells Kat that she needs to fall on Garen's sword?  CONSISTENCY RITO!

>fall on Garen's sword

5/7 perfect score
5/7 is a perfect score?

http://knowyourmeme.com/memes/5-7

I was as confused as you until i stumbled across this. The sub-par memes.

Illaoi will not put anyone or anything above her god, but her doctrine is very much about living your life as you see fit. If Illaoi feels like a relationship with Gangplank stagnates her motion, or doesn't move her forward in any way, then she won't perpetuate. She's very forward with going after what you want, but I've a feeling that her ideas on monogamy and long term relationships are much different.
It's s religion, what did you expect?

> [{quoted}](name=Ralanr,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=QlWhTePk,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2015-12-17T23:57:22.866+0000)
>
> It's s religion, what did you expect?

Chaotic Neutral.
always thought of religion as lawful neutral personally

You haven't looked at Illaoi's religion.

kinky?{{champion:51}} {{champion:254}}

> Illoai is a hypocrite.  She turned down Gangplank's cannon for her god, but tells Kat that she needs to fall on Garen's sword?  CONSISTENCY RITO!

{{champion:420}} "How can I love just one man? They break too easily!"

I believe she also has a quote for Garen along the same lines.

Tahm has quotes for both of them as well
could you imagine if they had a child?!   SO MUCH SPIN TO WIN!!!

Bride Kat and Groom Garen skins plz.

Ultimate skins full of particles and wedding music.

Instant purchase from me.  I don't even play Kat or Garen
